channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023090571
item.description:
Report X-2023090571

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: An unmarked pkg with 1 x 15 oz aerosol can was found wet upon arrival. Unmarked pkg was placed in an unauthorized unlined plastic bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Cap came off improperly packed 15 oz aerosol can allowing the spray head to be pushed releasing the pressurized contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2023090569
item.description:
Report X-2023090569

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg found to be wet and leaking. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps and failed inner seals on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found during day sort placed in a red hazmat bin and brought to Qa. DescribePack: Loose Cap DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was promptly placed in Red hazmat bin and brought to Qa

item.title: Report X-2023090417
item.description:
Report X-2023090417

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-04
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped during sortation causing damage to the contents which allowed it to leak. Pkg was placed in plastic bins and take to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: A small tear in the metal can from being dropped and crushed. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin upright with damage/hole on bottom of contents.

item.title: Report X-2023090360
item.description:
Report X-2023090360

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-01
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package went out for delivery and was returned to Station, consignee was not present to sign for DSR. Package leaked before another delivery attempt could be made. Package was left at QA workstation for inspection. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: One of the four plastic bottles has cracked cap, leaked. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of corrosive liquid.

item.title: Report X-2023090329
item.description:
Report X-2023090329

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg with no Hazmat markings containing Paint was found to be leaking and placed in an unauthorized unlined plastic bin. The bin was taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Failed friction lids with no safety clips on 2 x 5 L metal paint cans. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.
